snippet: Film Forum opens a weeklong run of Alain Resnais’s “Je T’Aime, Je T’Aime,” whose central character travels through time, reliving a relationship nonchronologically.
abstract: Film Forum opens weeklong run of Alain Resnais’s masterwork Je T’Aime, Je T’Aime, whose central character travels through time, reliving relationship nonchronologically.
lead_paragraph: Film Forum opens a weeklong run of Alain Resnais’s “Je T’Aime, Je T’Aime,” whose central character travels through time, reliving a relationship nonchronologically.

headline.print_headline: Fragmented Frames of the Love That Was, Taunting Yet Poignant
headline.seo: ‘Je T’Aime, Je T’Aime,’ Explores Time and Memory
headline.main: Fragmented Frames of the Love That Was, Taunting Yet Poignant
